alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 6:35AM EST until December 19 at 7:33AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Binghamton NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania...New York... Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Susquehanna and Broome Counties. Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Broome and Tioga Counties. Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Chenango and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre affecting Bradford and Tioga Counties. Tioughnioga River At Cortland affecting Cortland County. Beaver Kill At Cooks Falls affecting Sullivan and Delaware Counties. Oneida Creek At Oneida affecting Oneida and Madison Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Beaver Kill at Cooks Falls. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor flooding of lowland agricultural areas begins along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 10.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 645 PM EST.
